high_descs: Turn around and then turn right. Locate the small brown table in the corner.
Turn on the lamp that is on the small brown table.
Pick up the clock from the right side of the table.
anns.task_desc: Turn the lamp on and pick up a clock.

high_descs: Turn around complete then turn right. Go straight to the nightstand.
Turn on the lamp that is on the night stand.
Pick up the alarm clock from the night stand.
anns.task_desc: Turn on a lamp and pick up an alarm clock.

high_descs: Turn around and walk to the wall, then turn right to the nightstand in the corner.
Pick up the alarm clock on the table.
anns.task_desc: Use the light of a lamp to pick up an alarm clock.
